doc.title: Zigarrenkult - Kultzigarren
doc.plot: The big smoke is conquering the fine restaurants and exquisite bars all around the world. An overview about the history of tobacco and the culture of enjoyment. Locations are for example the manufacture of Partagas and world famous Cohiba, and the tobacco fields of the most expansive cigars coming from Cuba. On the trail of Ernest Hemingway, the camera visits the legendary Havana bars La Floridita and Bodeguita del Medio as well as the top restaurants and smoker's lounges of Austria's high society. In this film, you learn everything you want to know about cigars and the cult of creating and enjoying them.
